sections.title: Questions - EU Declaration of Conformity - Annex V

questions.title: Product Identification
questions.content: - Have you provided the **name, type, and any additional information** needed to uniquely identify the product with digital elements?

questions.title: Manufacturer / Authorised Representative Details
questions.content: Have you included the **name and address** of the manufacturer or the authorised representative?

questions.title: Sole Responsibility Statement
questions.content: Does the declaration explicitly state that it is **issued under the sole responsibility of the provider**?

questions.title: Object of the Declaration
questions.content: Have you clearly identified the **object of the declaration** (the specific product with digital elements), including any traceability information such as photographs if applicable?

questions.title: Conformity Statement
questions.content: Does the declaration include a statement that the product **conforms with the relevant Union harmonisation legislation**?

questions.title: Applied Harmonised Standards / Specifications
questions.content: Have you listed all **relevant harmonised standards**, common specifications, or cybersecurity certifications that support the conformity claim?

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.

questions.title: Notified Body Information (If Applicable)
questions.content:
If a notified body was involved, have you included:
- The **name and number** of the notified body?
- A **description of the conformity assessment procedure** performed?
- The **identification of the certificate issued**?

questions.title: Additional Information & Signature
questions.content:
Have you included:
- Any required **additional information**?
- The **signature block** with:
- Name and function of the signatory
- Place and date of issue
- Signature made on behalf of the provider?

responses.title: In Progress
